nodes.text: The Coruscant train was a repulsorcraft variant of the hovertrain, capable of attaining great altitudes. The main unit pulled a series of cars through the air.

A multitude of various models could be seen on Coruscant before and during the Clone Wars. Quinlan Vos nearly killed K'Kruhk once by pushing him off such a train. The 6-B hover train was a model used during the war, one of which was the scene of a chase between the criminal Cassie Cryar and the Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano.
